column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////So basically we stuck to the meat and potatoes which constitutes much of the menu space.  Great for sharing with groups
column3: and well presented in a nice pace; once we finished a dish another was right in its place.  Overall
column4: we ate WAY too much and were totally stuffed.  A friend got one of the bite-sized desserts (seriously
column6: but I still could not have fit anything else in my stomach.
